items.title: WatchlistScreeningHitID
items.description: ID of the associated screening hit.

confirmed_hits.description: Hits to mark as a true positive after thorough manual review. These hits will never recur or be updated once dismissed. In most cases, confirmed hits indicate that the customer should be rejected.

items.title: WatchlistScreeningHitID
items.description: ID of the associated screening hit.

dismissed_hits.description: Hits to mark as a false positive after thorough manual review. These hits will never recur or be updated once dismissed.

comment.description: A comment submitted by a team member as part of reviewing a watchlist screening.
comment.title: ReviewComment
comment.example: These look like legitimate matches, rejecting the customer.

client_id.title: ClientID
client_id.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.

secret.title: APISecret
secret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.
